title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         Outdoor Activities            Fort Stevens Anniversary of the Battle   Join the annual commemoration of the Battle of Fort Stevens and enjoy living history, music, lectures, and more!          Recreation Biking and Hiking   The National Park Service Civil War Defenses of Washington sites offer a variety of different trails for hikers and bikers.           Gardening 2016 Fort Dupont Community Garden   Information about the 2016 Fort Dupont Community Gardens and how to get involved!           Summer Concert Series Fort Dupont Summer Concerts   Check out information for the 2016 Fort Dupont Summer Concert Schedule          Â      Need to Know Info           Schedule of Events Calendar   A detailed calendar listing events planned for the Civil War Defenses of Washington.           Important Facts Visitor Safety    Information on things to know before visiting the Civil War forts.
